_sText:
Ladder Minigame like Takeshi's Castle door game.
One ladder will be able to bring you to the next level, the other will give you -35 Damage [Edit the trigger_hurt for more/less damage]

This was made for a friend's Jailbreak map, If you are intrested in taking the hole thing. Make sure to edit it, so none is going to be annoyed because of the fact you copied it.

**Read this:**
The button below will randomize the ladder that will bring you to the next level, make sure to push this on the begin of the round. Otherwise all the ladders will give -35 Damage.

Above the map there are 4 scouts with 10 bullets, next to the scouts there is a teleport which teleports you back down.
